data.name: ACE COMBAT™ 7: SKIES UNKNOWN - F-2A -Super Kai- Set
data.detailed_description:
An add-on for ACE COMBAT™ 7: SKIES UNKNOWN.

Contains the following:
- Playable Aircraft: F-2A -Super Kai-
A modernized multirole support fighter based on the F-2. It retains the F-2's excellent strength in interdictions at sea, but has been improved to handle both aerial and anti-surface combat, making it great for a variety of mission types.
- Also includes 7 skins, including the special "Tiger" skin.

This aircraft can equip the LASM, 6AAM, or IEWS as its special weapon.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-7100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750Ti(2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (3GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound card
